posts.post_content:
Hi all,

I'm looking to buy and/or trade for the T211 cards listed below.  If it's not listed below, I'd still be interested (as possible upgrades).

[STRIKE]Bartley (upgrade needed from SGC A)[/STRIKE]
[STRIKE]Cohen (upgrade needed from SGC 10)[/STRIKE]
E. DeMontreville
[STRIKE]Gribbin (upgrade needed from SGC 10)
Hanks (upgrade needed from SGC A)[/STRIKE]
Hess (upgrade needed from SGC 20 with date stamp)
[STRIKE]Hickman (upgrade needed from SGC 20)
Kane
Manush (upgrade needed from SGC A)
Seabourgh (upgrade needed from SGC A)[/STRIKE]
[STRIKE]Seitz[/STRIKE]
Sid Smith (upgrade needed from faded SGC 40)
Smith (upgrade needed from SGC A)
Thomas
Walker (upgrade needed from SGC A)

I have duplicates of Bartley, Bayless, Erloff, Fisher, Fritz, Huelsman, LaFitte, Lynch, Manush, Pepe, Steele, and Welf available for trade.

Cheers,
Steve

Thanks for looking and for any help. 

Cheers, 
Steve

Thank you for all of the help thus far!  Four cards down this week (three from trading!), including this beauty from a board member!

Cheers,
Steve

Another one down!  Thank you!!

Still looking for:
Cohen (upgrade needed from SGC 10)
E. DeMontreville
Hess (upgrade needed from SGC 20)
Kane
Manush (upgrade needed from SGC A)
Seitz
Smith (upgrade needed from SGC A)
Thomas
Walker (upgrade needed from SGC A)

In addition to the "upgrade needed" cards (which I would include in a trade for an upgrade), I also have duplicates of Bayless, DeMontreville, Fritz, and Pepe available for trade for any of the cards above that I don't have.

Cheers,
Steve

A new month...maybe a new card to cross off the list?

The De-Montreville is on e-bay right now.

[quote name="bocca001" post=1511467]The De-Montreville is on e-bay right now.[/QUOTE]

Thanks, Marc.  Unfortunately, I need the one with the "E." in the name caption, like this one Burdick's collection:
[IMG]http://images.metmuseum.org/CRDImages/dp/web-large/DP844104.jpg[/IMG]

I appreciate the help though!

Cheers,
Steve

Thanks for looking!
Great buyer here folks. He is still looking for a few --- I need him to finish this set so that he can trade me a nice dupe!

It's spring, and the search continues!  I managed to trade for the Kane and Manush, so knock those off the list!

PS - Bryan and I will trade once I finish off this set, don't worry. ;)

Congratz on knocking two off the list!

Sent from my SM-G950U using Tapatalk
